TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaGraphHttpExtension extends Azure.Media.Analytics.Edge.Models.MediaGraphExtensionProcessorBase

Docs.summary: A processor that allows the media graph to send video frames (mostly at low frame rates e.g. <5 fps) to an external inference container over an HTTP-based RESTful API. Inference results are relayed to downstream nodes.

Docs.param: The name for this processor node.
An array of the names of the other nodes in the media graph, the outputs of which are used as input for this processor node.
Endpoint to which this processor should connect.
Describes the parameters of the image that is sent as input to the endpoint.
